text: Saúl Fortunato Ongaro (24 August 1916 – 23 April 2004) was an Argentine footballer who played for clubs in Argentina and Chile. He was born in La Plata. ==Teams== * Estudiantes de La Plata 1937-1938 * Argentino de Quilmes 1939 * Estudiantes de La Plata 1939-1946 * Racing Club 1947-1950 * Universidad de Chile 1951-1952 * Gimnasia y Esgrima de La Plata 1953-1955 ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:2004 deaths Category:1916 births Category:Argentine footballers Category:Argentine expatriate footballers Category:Argentina international footballers Category:Gimnasia y Esgrima de La Plata footballers Category:Estudiantes de La Plata footballers Category:Racing Club de Avellaneda footballers Category:Universidad de Chile footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Chile Category:Argentine expatriate sportspeople in Chile Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Saúl Ongaro
